TopicTitle: Do you have a screenshot that makes you laugh every time?

Articles.Content:
[@dboi88](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/150676-dboi88/) Hahaha, I know this situation ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

I bet you were screaming inside: "No, no, no, no! Stand still! Aaah! .... Phew"

Nice save. Did you get it back into space on the first try?
![Sramok0.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Sramok0.jpg)

Where are those engines?

**Edited <time datetime="2017-01-13T22:46:37Z" title="01/13/2017 10:46  PM" data-short="7 yr">January 13, 2017</time> by Wolfair corp.**

> 
> 
> 13 hours ago, StrandedonEarth said:
> 
> 
> Nice save. Did you get it back into space on the first try?
> 

Yeah i managed to use the <abbr title="Reaction Control System">RCS</abbr> thursters to pop it back onto it's feet. The funniest part about all this is i have no idea how it happened. I set Mechjeb to autoland and went to the loo, came back to this . . .

![vZGlyY0.png](http://i.imgur.com/vZGlyY0.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2017-02-22T15:27:10Z" title="02/22/2017 03:27  PM" data-short="7 yr">February 22, 2017</time> by Wolfair corp.**

Bringing a whole new meaning to "conquer the mun"!

![a2556f872a.png](http://puu.sh/tW8SC/a2556f872a.png)
[@RandomUser](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/150836-randomuser/) Looks like what North Korea would definitely do )))
[@RandomUser](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/150836-randomuser/) Great, now I need to go build a tank. But it's 10:30 here, so I should be going to sleep. NRGGH!

Just in case anyone was wondering, our military- I mean, not at all tank rover, had a safe trip all the way to the surface of the Mun, for the conquering- I mean, scientific interest of Kerbals. 

Spoiler

![VYezsiI.png](http://i.imgur.com/VYezsiI.png)

Here are the tank- wait, I mean rover commanders, along with another rover.

That piloted by Tintin Kerman?  

![1797768655-moontank.jpg](http://cdn.quotesgram.com/img/53/32/1797768655-moontank.jpg)

Always watching over you...

![rDCpeDc.png](http://i.imgur.com/rDCpeDc.png)

Here is my entry:

![E4655C3F44AED3DFE9C193E45B7AB8FA7AAE6B06](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/275100415621036392/E4655C3F44AED3DFE9C193E45B7AB8FA7AAE6B06/)
